description: All route loads performed by all Orgs for the past 7 days.

schema.name: date
schema.description: The date the query was executed on.

schema.name: timestamp
schema.description: The timestamp the query was executed on.

schema.name: resource
schema.description: Stripped down name of the route minus org and query params.

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: The org for this route, joinable with clouddb.organizations.

schema.name: name
schema.description: The name of the org that this route was loaded for.

schema.name: user_id
schema.description: The user id of the user who loaded the page.

schema.name: email
schema.description: The email of the user who loaded the page.

schema.name: h2_possible
schema.description: Indicates if the browser is capable of making requests using the H2 protocol.

schema.name: http_protocol
schema.description: The protocol used to execute the GraphQL query, typically one of {http/1.1, h2}

schema.name: initial_load
schema.description: Indicates if the Single-Page Application loaded for the first time (true) or the user navigated within the app (false)

schema.name: duration_ms
schema.description: The duration, in milliseconds, that the route took to load.

schema.name: raw_url
schema.description: Full URL of the page visit including query parameters.

schema.name: team_owner
schema.description: Team that owns and maintains this route.

schema.name: slo_grouping
schema.description: The SLO grouping that this page rolls up to.

schema.name: trace_id
schema.description: The lightspan Trace ID of the route load trace.

schema.name: week
schema.description: The date range that the route load ocurred in.
